entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then west 50 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023
